title: (item suggestion) Cape of Reflection (you know you want it)
body:
Basically a thornmail for countering mages.
+60 or 70 MR
Reduces 15% spell damage (10% for AOE spells) taken and reflects it to the caster.
build should be something like.
Negatron cloak + Null magic mantle +1000gold (same cost as 5.19thornmail)
